actions: Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness, strengthens the Spleen and harmonizes the Middle Jiao.
With Zhi Ban Xia, for Phlegm, thin mucus and turbid Dampness.
With Zhi Ban Xia, Zhi Ke and Mang Xiao, for pain in both shoulders or swelling of the extremities due to Phlegm-Heat blocking the collaterals.
Promotes the movement of Qi, reduces distention and pressure and resolves hardenings.
Dries Dampness, transforms Phlegm, descends Rebellious Qi, stops vomiting, dissipates nodules and reduces Stagnation.
Purges accumulations, guides out Stagnation, softens hardness, moistens Dryness, clears Heat and reduces swelling.

symptoms: Pain in both arms or shoulders
Symptoms usually more pronounced on one side
manifestations.pulse: Deep and thin or Thready and wiry

conditions.name: Vascular edema of the upper extremities

contraindications: Contraindicated for those with weak constitutions.

modifications.purpose: coughing due to Phlegm-Heat in the Upper Jiao
swelling and pain in the limbs
